PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-11092015-07-16,  ,  ,  ,  PMO,  IC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectIndustry ** Crown Corporation Expenditures **
PrecisOrder directing the BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT BANK OF CANADA, THE CANADIAN TOURISM COMMISSION AND THE STANDARDS COUNCIL OF CANADA in order to (1) align their travel, hospitality, conference and event expenditures policies, guidelines and practices with Treasury Board policies, directives and related instruments on travel, hospitality, conference and event expenditures in a manner that is consistent with their legal obligations; and (2) report on the implementation of this directive in their next corporate plan.
AttachmentsAttachment
